nodes.text: Desert Draw was a simple card game for two players that was played at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Each player had three cards: a Bounty Hunter, the Sarlacc and a Thermal Detonator. First each player picked a card out of the three, then the cards were compared. Bounty Hunter beat a Thermal Detonator, Thermal Detonator beat a Sarlacc and Sarlacc beat the Bounty Hunter. It was usually played for money, the winner of a hand received the bets of both players.
The gambler Berema played Desert Draw with a spacers in the cantina of Nym's Stronghold on Lok.
Desert Draw is a small game offered by the Non-Player Character Berema in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It is played via the dialogue options.
The game follows the basic rock-paper-scissors principle.
